Package json

Class JSONValue

java.lang.Object
json.JSONValue
Direct Known Subclasses:
JSONArray, JSONBoolean, JSONNull, JSONNumber, JSONObject, JSONString
public abstract class JSONValue extends Object
Base class for JSON values.

Author:
mdixon
